subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Atlanta, which led the National League in home runs, and Los Angeles, whose rotation had a 3.14 E.R.A., will meet in an N.L. division series, beginning Thursday.
snippet: Atlanta, which led the National League in home runs, and Los Angeles, whose rotation had a 3.14 E.R.A., will meet in an N.L. division series, beginning Thursday.
